titleStmt.title: The vnfortvnate lovers a tragedie : as it was lately acted with great applause at the private house in Black-Fryers by His Majesties servants / the author William Davenant ...
titleStmt.author: D'Avenant, William, Sir, 1606-1668.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by R.H. and are to be sold by Francis Coles ...,

notesStmt.note: Pepys referred to this play as The ungrateful lovers.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
